channel.title: Digital-Assets on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Digital-Assets on Archive 03

item.title: Ondo Finance ($ONDO): A Deep Dive into the RWA Leader
item.description: A deep dive into Ondo Finance ($ONDO), the emerging leader in Real-World Asset (RWA) tokenization. Between its growth potential through a partnership with BlackRock and the potential risks of regulation and centralization, three characters fiercely debate the pros and cons of this new financial innovation.

item.title: Solana, the 'Ethereum Killer': What's the Investment Outlook for 2025?
item.description: A deep dive into the 2025 investment value of Solana ($SOL), the ‘Ethereum Killer’ of the crypto market. Three distinct characters engage in a sharp debate over its growth potential, driven by overwhelming speed and explosive ecosystem growth, versus its fundamental risks concerning network stability and decentralization.

item.title: The GENIUS Act: A Stroke of Genius That Could Change the Crypto Market?
item.description: Three girls engage in a heated debate over the ‘GENIUS Act’ passed by the U.S. Congress. Through Kurumi’s arguments for explosive growth from crypto’s institutional adoption and Mikael’s sharp analysis of the risks of contagion to the traditional financial system, they delve into the pros and cons of stablecoin regulation.

item.title: Bitcoin Breaks All-Time High: What Does It Truly Mean?
item.description: Bitcoin has shattered its all-time high, surpassing $112,000. Three distinct personas sharply debate the growth potential driven by institutional inflows and regulatory optimism against the potential risks fueled by excessive greed and historical patterns.
